import React from 'react'; import './about.css'; const About = () => { return (

About Us

Welcome to the Airport Directory App, your one-stop platform for all airport-related information. Whether you're a traveler or managing logistics, our app ensures you have access to essential services and details at your fingertips.

Our Mission

At Airport Directory, our goal is to provide seamless access to real-time flight information, making it easier for travelers to plan their journeys. We aim to bridge the gap between passengers and their travel needs with a user-friendly, accessible platform.

Features:

  • Flight Arrivals and Departures: View real-time updates on all incoming and outgoing flights, including any delays or gate changes.
  • Ticket Booking: Easily book tickets directly from our app with a streamlined, hassle-free process.
  • Search Functionality: Quickly search for flight details by entering your flight number or destination.
  • Admin Section: Dedicated tools for administrators to manage flights, users, and bookings.

Why Choose Us?

We believe in making airport navigation and flight information access as simple as possible. Our app combines advanced technology with ease of use, providing real-time updates and essential travel services in one place.

); }; export default About;
